```php
CREATE TABLE `tbl_sys_message` 
( 
  `id` INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `message` TEXT NOT NULL, 
  `create_time` DATETIME,
  `create_user_id` INTEGER,
  `update_time` DATETIME,
  `update_user_id` INTEGER  
)
```
